text.13_Chapter, 5_Verse, 1_Comment: And Qippa'on. It means darkness, like solidified matter, which is something clear which became thick, as in (Exodus 15: 8) "the deep froze [in the heart of the sea].
text.13_Chapter, 5_Verse, 0_Comment: Light of yeqarot. Clear/bright light as in (Job 31:26) "or the moon walking yaqar (in brightness/splendor).
